data.name: Wonder Trips
data.description:
Need a wonderful trip!! Or looking for a fun time: this is travel time !! You can now choose your own journey and enjoy discovering different wonderlands.

Wonder Trip is an organized journey into many lands: desert Pearl, dinosaurs land, jetski island, and more. Live your journey with a series of four stages:
 
1- panoramic tour: firstly, you can get a beautiful guided panoramic view from the sky by riding Alladinâ€™s carpet, a Gyrosphere, and more, 

2- exploration-free time: get your free time to explore different monuments: the hidden village, the fantastic oasis, the secret cave, the dinosaur lake, and more surprises by riding a camel, a dinosaur, or a jetski

3- challenging mission: wonder trip allows you to show your skills by competing with local people in jetski racing or camel riding. You can also live the adventure of escaping from the panicked dinosaurs and Predatory birds. 

4- meditation time: enjoy a peaceful time, and get a special moment at the end of your journey. Get relaxed by watching the stars in the Sahara at night, enjoying a beautiful sunset over parasailing, or meditating by riding a cable car.

Your journey has started. Wonder Trip is possible now...
